entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade to Arcade 9 #71827
  • [VB] `CInt(Math.Round(doubleValue, MidPointRounding.AwayFromZero))` and `CInt` for rounding methods for `Decimal` are not optimized #71819
  • [VB] Remove redundant `Call` #71818
  • Add `IParameterSymbol.IsParamCollection` property #71816

Closed

  • Implement abstract class code fix does not consider nullability for dynamic #70623
    Backlog
  • Initializing a ConcurrentBag with a dynamic variable using a collection initializer results in MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #71703
    17.10
  • Primary constructor parameters do not work with MemberNotNull attributes #71710
  • Update DocumentationCommentId.CreateDeclarationId to return null instead of throw. #71460
  • Feature "Document highlights" fails with exception when navigating in code using pointers #70159
  • [Bug] Only allow a single instance of VS telemetry in the language server #71101

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing #71829
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add strong contract assertion about project syncing #71828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure related docs in the preview workspace link to same sourcetext #71825
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always return the same instance when asking for the same frozen doc snapshot from a solution. #71822
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions for arrays #71820
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71817
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add test demonstrating correct behavior #71821
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make dynamic nullable if its type was annotated to be nullable when generating its type syntax #71813
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Only parse a single document when freezing documents with related linked files #71750
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into ParamsCollections #71824
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move type to its own file #71823
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use collection expressions for builder patterns. #71814
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Append chars more efficiently when creating doc comment IDs #71811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Avoid unnecessary temporary builders when creating syntax lists. #71799
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add additional tests suggested from code review #71815
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use collection expressions for empty collections #71808
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Load Roslyn DevKit assemblies into the default ALC #71807
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Append chars more efficiently when creating strings #71812
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #69469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
